title: 1.14的攻击伤害计分板
author: lijiaxiang666
txt_content: 1.14中/scoreboard objectives add damage stat.damageDealt damage无效了，求一个新版本的攻击伤害计分板

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard objectives add test minecraft.custom:minecraft.damage_xxxxxx
即可

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard objectives add damage stat.damageDealt damage 记分板名 minecraft.custom:minecraft.damage_dealt damage复制代码
建议多看看wiki
https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.com/%E8%AE%B0%E5%88%86%E6%9D%BF





image.png (117.67 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-8-5 11:17 上传

replies.author: lijiaxiang666
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2019-8-5 10:52
/scoreboard objectives add test minecraft.custom:minecraft.damage_xxxxxx
即可
xxxxxx是填dealt吗

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
lijiaxiang666 发表于 2019-8-5 11:34
xxxxxx是填dealt吗
是得
还有其他参数
例如taken
表示伤害的不同类型

造成/受到伤害
